unnormalised: Interesting transfer window! East Bengal seems to be building a strong squad, especially with the rumoured signing of Mahesh Gawli. Hope they perform better than last season's Durand Cup performance. Mohun Bagan, on the other hand, needs a "Chak De! India" moment to rekindle their spirit after losing key players. Can Gokulam Kerala maintain their form? All eyes on the ISL kickoff! Rs. 5 Crores seems like a hefty price tag.

Hope they perform better than last season's Durand Cup performance. Mohun Bagan, on the other hand, needs a "Chak De! India" moment to rekindle their spirit after losing key players.
